Name: Barbell Benchpress
user_notes: Put safety bars to lvl 15

Name: Bent Over Row
user_notes: Bend from the hip first and control movement downward.
Muscle group: lats, rhomboids, trapezius muscles, posterior deltoids

Name: Standing Supinated Curl
user_notes: Use wrist straps for this exercise.

Name: Cable Fly
user_notes: Use short handle bar attachment for this exercise.

Name: Chin Up
user_notes: Keep my grip shoulder width.

Name: Deadlift
user_notes: Don't use a mixed grip when low weight

Name: Front Raise
user_notes: Crossing your arms is better than the standard elbow forward

Name: Glute Extension
user_notes: Keep focus on the glutes, avoid lifting with lower back.
Muscle group: glutes, hamstrings, calves, lats, erector spinae

Name: Good Morning
user_notes: Use low weight and slow controlled movement to prevent injury
Muscle group: glutes, hamstrings, upper back, lats, calves

Name: Hammer Curl
user_notes: Keep your elbows to the side

Name: Incline Bench Press
user_notes: Use seat level 3
Muscle group: upper pectoral muscles, anterior deltoids, triceps

Name: Lat Pulldown
user_notes: bend over at the hip and let arms feel stretch before rep
Muscle group: lats, forearms, biceps, deltoids, lower and upper back, trapezius muscles, core

Name: Lateral Raise
user_notes: Bend over at the hip to target the middle of the shoulders

Name: Leg Extension
user_notes: Use seat level 5, and the leg position set to lvl A

Name: Leg Press
user_notes: Do extra warmup reps and knee wraps to protect knees
Muscle group: quadriceps, glutes, hamstrings, hip, and calves

Name: Pull Up
user_notes: Keep your legs slightly forward rather bending legs back.

Name: Rear Delt Fly
user_notes: Use wrist straps for protection
Muscle group: rear deltoids, upper and lower trapezius muscles, rhomboids

Name: Romanian Deadlift (Barbell)
user_notes: Dont use mixed grip

Name: Seated Cable Row
user_notes: Use the narrow grip attachment

Name: Squat
user_notes: Bar should be set to level 8

Name: Weighted Dips
user_notes: Keep the arm width narrow rather than wide
Muscle group: pectoral muscles, triceps, rhomboids, anterior deltoids

Name: Shoulder Press
user_notes: Do standing rather than sitting to engage core

Name: Stretching
user_notes: warmup knees before stretching
